definition: to criticize/to find fault with/to denounce
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end

sentences.english: " Moreover, the commission also chides South Korea for not embracing its "important" initiative.
sentences.chinese: 此外，该委员会还指责韩国不接受其“重要”倡议。

sentences.english: Why do they always accuse us so brutally?
sentences.chinese: 为什么他们这么粗暴地指责我们？

sentences.english: Opposition politicians blame the government, saying a river project has reduced farmland.
sentences.chinese: 反对党的政治人物指责政府河川的计划使得农地减少。

sentences.english: How ungrateful then that, as the talks limp towards collapse, accusing fingers are being pointed at America.
sentences.chinese: 随着对话走向破裂，大家非常不领情面得指责美国。

sentences.english: Today, along with the advancement of globalization, it is pointless and makes no sense for countries to blame eath other.
sentences.chinese: 在经济全球话的今天，国家间互相指责是无济于事的。

sentences.english: Menon however refrained from blaming Pakistan for the blasts.
sentences.chinese: 梅农对爆炸的指责有所控制，没有直接指向巴基斯坦。

sentences.english: Eliminating problem by transferring the blame to others is often called scape-goating.
sentences.chinese: 消除问题靠转移指责给别人常常被叫做替罪羊现象。

sentences.english: Russia accuses Georgia of secretly massing troops for an invasion of Abkhazia.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯指责格鲁吉亚秘密集结军队入侵阿布哈兹。

sentences.english: Officials had accused them of violating health regulations.
sentences.chinese: 官员们指责他们的设备不符合卫生条例。

sentences.english: Cage changed his name to deflect accusations of nepotism.
sentences.chinese: 凯奇改了名字以避免别人指责他搞裙带关系。

sentences.english: China has accused Saudi Arabia of dumping petrochemicals on its markets.
sentences.chinese: 中国指责沙特在中国市场上倾销石油化工产品。

sentences.english: Yi Yi surprised to learn the truth and exasperated, accusing children s four seasons in calculating.
sentences.chinese: 易奕获知真相惊怒交加，指责童四季攻于心计。

sentences.english: All the Israelites railed against Moses and Aaron.
sentences.chinese: 所有犹太人开始指责摩西和亚伦。

sentences.english: He was branded a traitor to his country.
sentences.chinese: 他被指责为一个叛国者。

sentences.english: The prosecution and defense were bandying accusations back and forth.
sentences.chinese: 原告和被告你来我往，互相指责。

sentences.english: More incapable withstanding in all directions accusation.
sentences.chinese: 更无力承受四面八方的指责。

definition: to criticize harshly/to denounce/to attack viciously
to accuse/to denounce/to make a complaint against/denunciation
to condemn in speech and in writing (idiom)/to denounce by word and pen
frigid irony and scorching satire (idiom); to mock and ridicule
to hurl abuse/to deride/to call sb names
